## Pruebas

```{r}
#| code-fold: show
#| code-summary: "Ocultar/Mostrar código"
#| warning: false
#| message: false

# Instalar plotly si no está instalado
if (!require("plotly")) {
  install.packages("plotly")
  library(plotly)
}

library(plotly)

fig <- plot_ly(
    type = 'scatterpolar',
    fill = 'toself'
  )
fig <- fig %>%
  add_trace(
    r = c(39, 28, 8, 7, 28, 39),
    theta = c('A','B','C', 'D', 'E', 'A'),
    name = 'Group A'
  )
fig <- fig %>%
  add_trace(
    r = c(1.5, 10, 39, 31, 15, 1.5),
    theta = c('A','B','C', 'D', 'E', 'A'),
    name = 'Group B'
  )
fig <- fig %>%
  layout(
    polar = list(
      radialaxis = list(
        visible = TRUE,
        range = c(0,50)
      )
    )
  )

fig
```
